data.title: Cedar Lake Cellars
data.meta_description: INTRODUCING AN EXCLUSIVE MUSIC EVENT WITH Justin Moore Country On It Tour Bring your family and friends for this special event with Multi-PLATINUM hitmaker, Justin Moore! Sing along to “Small [...]Read More... from Justin Moore
data.text:
ENJOY THE DAY

Come out early and stay late — we will be partying all day long! The winery opens at 10 a.m. for all guests (21 and up) who want to beat the crowd and relax before The Landing gates open for the show. Guests are welcome to bring blankets and folding chairs for the concert venue lawn.

FOOD & DRINK

There will be a lots of delicious food options, including a variety of food trucks, Cedar Lake Cellars grill and more! And what’s a country music event–in the middle of wine country–without wine? Don’t worry, we’ll have plenty of beverage options, as well as beer, drinks and our famous wine slushies.

What Is Included With My Ticket?

• Event Access

• Live Music

• Free Parking

Where Is the Event?

The Landing @ Cedar Lake Cellars

11008 Schreckengast Road

Wright City, MO 63390

Is There A VIP Ticket Option?

There is not an all-inclusive VIP ticket, however there are a limited number of up close Pit tickets in addition to General Admission.

Can I Reserve Seating?

All seating areas are first come, first served. Bring blankets and chairs to relax outdoors in the expansive concert field.

Can I Bring My Own Food Or Drinks?

We offer an array of amazing food and beverage options throughout the winery. Treat yourself to a day of fun and relaxation by leaving your own at home and enjoying ours. Outside food, drink and coolers are not allowed.

Is There A Parking Fee?

No — general event parking is free!

What Can I Bring?

• Plenty of blankets and chairs

• Your family and friends

• Money to purchase a wide selection of food and beverages

• An “I am so excited to have an awesome time” attitude

What Can’t I Bring?

• No outside food, drink, or coolers

• No pets

• No tents

• No tailgating

Do You Provide Refunds?

We do not offer refunds to our event.

COVID-19 Refund Policy

The health of our community and staff is of the utmost importance to us. At this point, we are continuing to plan for this event which is scheduled several months from now. Currently, there is not an order in place by government officials that closes our facility in May and we fully intend on proceeding with our event. We have over 400 acres of land at Cedar Lake Cellars and will continue to strategically plan our event to proactively ensure safety as well as adhere to the recommendations made by officials. If a new order is put in place that directly affects our business and event, your tickets will be refunded.
